page.title: 07 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: This is information about our area.People who work and people that don't work. We have got 41 people working in our area and 24 people that are not working in our block.There are also 14 housewives.We thought that the building trade would have had the most number of people in employment but most people were farmers.There were 11 farmers, 3 office workers and 5 in the building trade.For transport there were 3 people and for factory work there were also 3 and for a shop or pub there were 4.There were 12 people that worked at home. Distances for travelling to work were as follows. 13 people had to travel 1-5 miles. .Nine people had to travel 6-10 miles and 7 people more than 15 miles.
